Text.Page:
Oh no! This whole time I thought that I'd managed to keep the shiny jewelry, but it looks like they got that, too! It's worth more than everything else!

{@LinkCreature:5#18#Bauba} specifically asked me to get it for him—those tuwangis must have stolen it to bring it to him.

Please—either go bring the jewelry back or at least bring back the payment for it!

Well, I can tell you that as of now, I'm cutting my ties with these tuwangi troublemakers. Thank you for getting my things back—at least now I can go and sell them elsewhere.

Here—I don't have a lot of fluid money right now, but take this for your efforts.
I know I've asked a lot of you, but please. I could really use the help.
